full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MED LUGS KYI RJE BTZUN SGROL MA'I MAndAL BZHI MCHOD DANG 'BREL BAR DPAL LHA MO'I MCHOD TSUL GYI CHOG DGE LEGS 'DOD DGU'I DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): SU DDH'I AA SHVA GHO shA'I MING PA,
dates_of_the_author_(зохиогдсон_өдөр): RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I BGRANG BYA LNGA BCU PA ME PHO 'BRUG LO'I RGYAL ZLA BA'I YAR TSES BCO LNGA'I NYIN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @029A *, ,(CES BLA MED LUGS KYI RJE BTZUN SGROL MA'I MAndAL BZHI MCHOD DANG 'BREL BA'I DPAL LDAN LHA MO MCHOD TSUL GYI CHO GA GSAL BAR BKOD PA DGE LEGS 'DOD DGU'I @029B DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BLA MA LHA BSRUNG LA DAD CING GUS PA DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'OD ZER GYIS LHA DAR DANG RTEN 'BREL 'GRIGS PA'I RTEN DANG BCAS CHOG 'KHYER BDE LA KHA GSAL BA ZHIG DGOS TSUL GYI BSKUL MA BYUNG BA DANG RTEN, RANG GZHAN GYI LAG LEN DU'ANG PHAN PA'I LAM DU 'GYUR RAM SNYAM NAS, ,DAM PA GONG MA'I GSUNG TSIG BYIN CAN RNAMS LAS SNYING PO BSDUS TE 'JUG PA BDE BA'I TSUL DU, ,^ MDO RGYUD MAN NGAG RGYA MTSO'I PHRENG BA 'DZIN PA'I BTZUN GZUGS SU DDH'I : AA SHVA @030A *, ,GHO shA'I MING PAS RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I BGRANG BYA LNGA BCU PA ME PHO 'BRUG LO'I RGYAL ZLA BA'I YAR TSES BCO LNGA'I NYIN DGE BAR, ,'DZAM GLING BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I 'BYUNG KHUNGS SU GYUR BA'I CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGA' LDAN THEG CHEN GLING GI RANG PA, ZHAG DHARMA GA NYDZAR SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,'DIS KYANG MTHA' DBUS BSTAN 'GRO YON LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,) SKYABS GSUM KUN 'DUS DRIN CAN BLA MA MCHOG ,DUS GSUM RGYAL YUM AARYA T'A RE MA, ,SRID GSUM @030B DBANG BSGYUR DPAL LDAN LHA MOR BCAS, ,GSANG GSUM THUGS RJE BDEN PA'I SHIS PAS SKYONGS, ,GANG LA BRTEN NAS CHOS MTHUN 'DOD DON KUN, ,BDE GLAG SGRUB BYED MAndAL BZHI CHOG 'DI, ,DGE SLONG SRI MNAN NGAG DBANG 'OD ZER BCAS, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED SPAR GYI GTENG DU BSGRUBS, ,'DIR 'BAD DGE BAS BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS, ,ZHABS PAD BRTAN CING MDZAD 'PHRIN DAR ZHING RGYAS, ,'BREL THOGS CHOS MTHUN BSAM DON LHUN 'GRUB @031A *, ,CING, ,'JIG RTEN CHOS SRID 'BYOR PAS KHYAB GYUR CIG , ,,(CES PA 'DI NI, SPAR GYI RGYU YON SBYOR BA DE DAG GIS RAB DKAAR LHA DAR DANG BCAS TE DGOS TSUL YOL BA BZHIN, ^ CHOG BSGRIGS PA PO NYID KYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
